name: weather-checker
description: A serverless function which gets the weather for a given location at regular intervals

scripts.create-action: ibmcloud wsk action create glowie-bowie-weather-checker index.js --native Archive.zip  --kind nodejs:10
scripts.deploy-action: ibmcloud wsk action update glowie-bowie-weather-checker index.js --native Archive.zip --kind nodejs:10

author: Sean M. Tracey
